text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One afternoon, I hear a strange<n>mumbling in the gym.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Deadlift... Dead... It sounds so scary...<n>But, well...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Prez breezed through all of these, so I<n>can't shy away! All
right, let's start<n>with 200 kilos.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Uwaahh! T-Trainer?! Don't scare me<n>like that! Ugh, and I
was just about to<n>lift some deads.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! It's a type of weight training,<n>don't you know?
They're called<n>deadlifts.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You pick up a barbell off the ground<n>with both hands,
then—"Eyah!"—lift it<n>up to your waist.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
And Prez did 200 kilos like they're<n>nothing. So I've got to
give it a try too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Starting at the same weight as<n>Symboli Rudolf would be far
too<n>ambitious. I try to recommend another<n>exercise for the
same muscle group,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Nghh... But I wanna do the same<n>exercises! Prez chose this,
so there's<n>got to be a reason.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
If I don't do the exact same things in<n>the exact same way,
I'll never catch<n>up to her. So I'm gonna give it a shot!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: All right, here I go!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Urrrghhhh!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I-I did it! Hey, Trainer, did you seethat? I can lift the same weight asPrez!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Now to keep this up! I'll<n>surpass her in no
time!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Uuup, and down. Uuup, and down. ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I can do it... I can do this! You know,<n>maybe I can do all the
other exercises<n>she used to do too!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Right, on to the next one! Let's go!
choice_data_list: Maybe you should pace yourself a little...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I try to warn her, but it seems all Teio<n>can hear is the
clanging of weights.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Traaaaineeer... Trai— Urgh...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Nngh... Phew. My body's crying out<n>for help. Didn't know
muscles could<n>be this sore...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But hey, that's proof that they're<n>growing! The sorer they
are, the<n>bigger they'll get. Okay, off to the<n>training course!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Owwie ouch ouch ouch! It huuurts!<n>There's no way I can
train like this!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... Maybe I couldn't handle it<n>after all, doing the same
exercises as<n>Prez...
choice_data_list: Pretty sure it was your pacing, or lack thereof...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, you think?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I did kinda get carried away...<n>Guess I should've
listened to you<n>more, huh.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Sowwy... So, uh, I won't do it again,<n>but can you do anything
about this<n>soreness?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Otherwise, the whole day's gonna go<n>to waste. Please?
Pleeease?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I do what I can, helping her stretch,<n>and warming up her
muscles.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, is this for real? I feel so much<n>better! Trainer, you've
got to be a<n>genius! Why'd that work so well?
choice_data_list: Your muscles are flexible, that's why.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
They are? Huh. So I might not be as<n>tough as Prez, but I can
spring back<n>faster at least. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay, I'm all set! Back to training!<n>Ouch, ouch!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whaaat? Even I have my limits, I<n>guess. Aw, this sucks...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Okay, well, guess I'll just have to<n>rest up today. Sorry,
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But just you wait. One day, I'll be so<n>strong, I'll be immune
to muscle<n>soreness!
